analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TruPreSale.finalise (/unique_chucks/16/0x19662c22eaab9fb69add72ef54b296c5a72593b5.sol):
	External calls:
	- completion() (/unique_chucks/16/0x19662c22eaab9fb69add72ef54b296c5a72593b5.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isCompleted (/unique_chucks/16/0x19662c22eaab9fb69add72ef54b296c5a72593b5.sol)

Reentrancy in TruUpgradeableToken.setUpgradeAgent (/unique_chucks/16/0x19662c22eaab9fb69add72ef54b296c5a72593b5.sol#328-340):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(newUAgent.isUpgradeAgent()) (/unique_chucks/16/0x19662c22eaab9fb69add72ef54b296c5a72593b5.sol#335-336)
	- require(bool)(newUAgent.originalSupply() == totalSupply) (/unique_chucks/16/0x19662c22eaab9fb69add72ef54b296c5a72593b5.sol#336-337)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- upgradeAgent (/unique_chucks/16/0x19662c22eaab9fb69add72ef54b296c5a72593b5.sol#339)

TruSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/16/0x19662c22eaab9fb69add72ef54b296c5a72593b5.sol#580-627) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-truToken.mint(_purchaser,noOfTokens) (/unique_chucks/16/0x19662c22eaab9fb69add72ef54b296c5a72593b5.sol#619-620)

TruPreSale.completion (/unique_chucks/16/0x19662c22eaab9fb69add72ef54b296c5a72593b5.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-truToken.mint(multiSigWallet,poolTokens) (/unique_chucks/16/0x19662c22eaab9fb69add72ef54b296c5a72593b5.sol)
	-truToken.finishMinting(true,false) (/unique_chucks/16/0x19662c22eaab9fb69add72ef54b296c5a72593b5.sol)

Reentrancy in TruSale.TruSale (/unique_chucks/16/0x19662c22eaab9fb69add72ef54b296c5a72593b5.sol#507-517):
